question: int x = 5; if (x > 10) { System.out.println("x is greater than 10"); } else { System.out.println("x is less than or equal to 10"); }
int age = 18; if (age >= 18) { System.out.println("You are eligible to vote"); }
int num = 7; if (num % 2 == 0) { System.out.println("num is even"); } else { System.out.println("num is odd"); }
boolean sunny = true; if (sunny) { System.out.println("It's sunny outside"); } else { System.out.println("It's not sunny outside"); }
char grade = 'B'; if (grade == 'A') { System.out.println("Excellent"); } else if (grade == 'B' || grade == 'C') { System.out.println("Well done"); } else { System.out.println("You can do better"); }
int sales = 1000; if (sales > 1000) { System.out.println("Good job"); } else if (sales > 500) { System.out.println("Average job"); } else { System.out.println("Needs improvement"); }
int num1 = 10; int num2 = 5; if (num1 > num2) { System.out.println("num1 is greater than num2"); }
answer:
num1 = 10
num2 = 5
if num1 > num2:
    print("num1 is greater than num2")
wrongAnswers:
if num1 > num2:
	print("num1 is greater than num2")
num1 = 10
num2 = 5

num1 = 10
num2 = 5
if num1 => num2:
    print("num1 is greater than num2")

num1 = 10
num2 = 5
if(num1 > num2):
    print("num1 is greater than num2")

question: float temperature = 25.5; if (temperature > 30) { System.out.println("Hot weather"); } else if (temperature > 20) { System.out.println("Moderate weather"); } else { System.out.println("Cold weather"); }
boolean isRaining = false; boolean isSunny = true; if (isRaining && isSunny) { System.out.println("Rainbow is visible"); } else { System.out.println("No rainbow"); }
int number = -7; if (number > 0) { System.out.println("Positive number"); } else if (number < 0) { System.out.println("Negative number"); } else { System.out.println("Zero"); }
